results.definition: (computer science) a tiny electromagnetic coil and metal pole used to write and read magnetic patterns on a disk
be in charge of
examples: Who is heading this project?

results.definition: a person who is in charge
examples: the head of the whole operation

results.definition: that which is responsible for one's thoughts, feelings, and conscious brain functions; the seat of the faculty of reason
examples: I couldn't get his words out of my head

results.definition: be the first or leading member of (a group) and excel
examples: This student heads the class

results.definition: the educator who has executive authority for a school
the upper part of the human body or the front part of the body in animals; contains the face and brains
examples: he stuck his head out the window

results.definition: travel in front of; go in advance of others
examples: The procession was headed by John

results.definition: the part in the front or nearest the viewer
examples: he was at the head of the column

results.definition: a line of text serving to indicate what the passage below it is about
examples: the heading seemed to have little to do with the text

results.definition: a V-shaped mark at one end of an arrow pointer
a difficult juncture
examples: matters came to a head yesterday

results.definition: forward movement
examples: the ship made little headway against the gale

results.definition: oral stimulation of the genitals
examples: they say he gives good head

results.definition: a dense cluster of flowers or foliage
examples: a head of cauliflower
a head of lettuce

results.definition: the subject matter at issue
examples: under the head of minor Roman poets

results.definition: direct the course; determine the direction of travelling
the source of water from which a stream arises
examples: they tracked him back toward the head of the stream

results.definition: a natural elevation (especially a rocky one that juts out into the sea)
(grammar) the word in a grammatical constituent that plays the same grammatical role as the whole constituent
a membrane that is stretched taut over a drum
an individual person
examples: tickets are $5 per head

results.definition: a projection out from one end
examples: the head of the nail
a pinhead is the head of a pin

results.definition: a rounded compact mass
examples: the head of a comet

results.definition: a single domestic animal
examples: 200 head of cattle

results.definition: a user of (usually soft) drugs
examples: the office was full of secret heads

results.definition: be in the front of or on top of
examples: The list was headed by the name of the president

results.definition: form a head or come or grow to a head
examples: The wheat headed early this year

results.definition: (nautical) a toilet on board a boat or ship
remove the head of
examples: head the fish

results.definition: take its rise
examples: These rivers head from a mountain range in the Himalayas

results.definition: that part of a skeletal muscle that is away from the bone that it moves
the foam or froth that accumulates at the top when you pour an effervescent liquid into a container
examples: the beer had a large head of foam

results.definition: the front of a military formation or procession
examples: the head of the column advanced boldly
they were at the head of the attack

results.definition: the length or height based on the size of a human or animal head
examples: he is two heads taller than his little sister
his horse won by a head

results.definition: the pressure exerted by a fluid
examples: a head of steam

results.definition: the rounded end of a bone that fits into a rounded cavity in another bone to form a joint
examples: the head of the humerus

results.definition: the striking part of a tool
examples: the head of the hammer

results.definition: the tip of an abscess (where the pus accumulates)
the top of something
examples: the head of the stairs
the head of the page
the head of the list

results.definition: to go or travel towards
examples: where is she heading
We were headed for the mountains

results.definition: (usually plural) the obverse side of a coin that usually bears the representation of a person's head
examples: call heads or tails!
